articles.title: Virus worries force cancellation of major tech show in Spain
articles.description: Organizers of the world’s biggest mobile technology fair are pulling the plug over worries about the viral outbreak from China
articles.content:
LONDON -- 
Organizers of the worlds biggest mobile technology fair are pulling the plug over worries about the viral outbreak from China.
The annual Mobile World Congress show will no longer be held as planned in Barcelona, Spain, on Feb. 24-27.

articles.title: Asian shares rise despite continuing virus fears
articles.description: Asian shares are rising although worries about the outbreak of a new virus in the region continue to weigh on investor sentiments
